title: Mobile Microlearning Mathematics Instructional Design Workshop for Administrators

context.additional_context: Collaborative educational design workshop for novice mathematics domain managers, developing mobile learning-optimized instructional design specifications through workshop-based requirements analysis

learning_goals: Through workshops, over 85% of learners can clearly define requirements for mathematics microlearning education
In collaborative design processes, over 90% of learners can apply instructional design principles reflecting digital learning environment characteristics
Based on formative assessment results, over 75% of learners can experience iterative design improvement processes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
